website_summaries.verdict: The Classic Leather is easily one of those sneakers from Reebok that would have people nodding in approval at the mere mention of the name. More than 30 years after it jumped into the footwear scene, this heritage running sneaker continues to help characterize and influence the culture of youth and sneakers alike.Sold at a somewhat affordable price, people are treated to an iconic shoe that is versatility-personified and extremely comfortable. These two prime assets should make the Reebok Classic Leather sneaker as ubiquitous as ever.
pros: The comfort is evident, many reviewers confirm
The price of the Reebok Classic Leather shoe, considering its style and performance, is satisfactory, according to several buyers
Some purchasers make comments that this is one of the best shoes in the Reebok Classics Collection
Most of the users notice that the Reebok Classic Leather sneaker on feet fits true to size
More than a few individuals with jobs requiring them to stay on their feet for long hours love the support and cushioning of the Classic Leather from Reebok
A handful of reviewers find the arch support to be just perfect
Some users are very proud that they can use the sneaker with almost any outfit
Some tag the Reebok Classic Leather as an underrated lifestyle shoe that offers more features and styles compared to other hyped shoes
A good number of Reebok Classic Leather users use it as a daily beater and shows durability and longevity for years despite almost daily use
A couple of users say the shoe has a cozy fit for those with narrow to wide feet
cons: A couple of reviewers say the Classic Leather used to have a better quality of leather material in the upper than the ones used today
Many users find the white Reebok Classic Leather sneakers hard to clean when it gets beaten up and dirty after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Love em.
customer_reviews.text: Got a problem with my big toe, which generally hurts in any type of shoe but it don't in these and therefore I'm grateful, they are comfortable, light and man about town stylish, now wearing them to the office as you can get away with black trainers. I won't be asked to keep them on in bed by my girlfriend or win any marathons in them, but they are very fit for purpose. Tip wait for the price drop, I got mine for <40 quid.
customer_reviews.author: P Bloke

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: I use this shoes almost daily at work where I have to walk around 8km daily over 12 hours. For the last months that I had the product I am very pleased with what I have bought. Especially for the price that I paid. They are easy to clean because of their leather surface but also light and comfortable. However when I bought them they were making a funny noise for over 2 hours when I first worn them which made me to sent back the product but luckily and it was all temporary. I rate this as 5/5 gj
customer_reviews.author: 1x1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as usual.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for years and won't look at anything else. The pair I wear to work had started to fall apart after over 10 years of use so needed to sacrifice my current good pair and buy these for best. The all black ones are more expensive these days so decided to go with the gum soles. Exactly the same shoes but a lot cheaper with the tan sole which is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Smart and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I broke my​ ankle a couple of years​ ago, and have had problems with shoes ever since. These are ideal for an office environment and extremely comfortable. When they first arrived they were very tight, as other reviewers have said, but they only needed re-lacing. Now they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff, London

customer_reviews.title: Reliable footwear, multi -generational
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair as a gift for my son who is 31, because I remembered that 5 years ago he thought I was cool having bought a pair, although I had no idea it was the trendy thing to do at the time, mine continue to go strong, it would be nice to replace the soles. My son 5 years ones very pleased with his pair. Price was fair. Leather is good, shoe is sturdy and fit is normal.
customer_reviews.author: Camellia Pen

customer_reviews.title: Good for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: These are great if your teens have wide feet like mine do. Super fit and very comfy and hard wearing. Great buy for teen boys.
customer_reviews.author: Zena

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Being leather these trainers stretch to fit your feet and are comfortable. But expensive as I wear them for work and get through 2 pairs a year.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Too Small Even sizing Up
customer_reviews.text: I sized up by a half as recommended and still too small. They look smart and well finished but quite narrow too. I do not envisage a larger size being more comfortable. I have bought New balance for sometime and they have been very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: dsido

customer_reviews.title: Have been wearing the same type of trainers for years ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing the same type of trainers for years, I think this is my seventh pair. Exactly as expected and quick delivery through Prime.
customer_reviews.author: SteveH

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my brother, came in good packaging, no problems at all
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Never disapoints
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying the same trainers for years and not only are these extremely comfortable, a good fit and good for everyday use, they last for years without fail. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D Temple

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very pleased with them, good price, and correct size, he’s one happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trainers
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these. Don't think I will order any other make if they stay in production.
customer_reviews.author: Pauldb50

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight trainer's
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight trainer's, not quite wide enough for my husband, otherwise nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well designed trainers,that are always comfortable to wear & fit well.
customer_reviews.author: robert clark

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with size and quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remember them. Great quality and despite being of style very good trainer and great fit. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Scott carr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are a bargain for only £36, made of leather these shoes are extremely comfortable, possibly the comfiest shoes I own. The classic design never goes out of fashion and the gum soles look great!
customer_reviews.author: James 2371

customer_reviews.title: Seem ok
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough. A bit flimsier than I recall but seem legit. I went for 10.5 but probably should have bought 11. Seem slightly on the small side, but overall good trainers
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected from this product. Good fit from an iconic brand and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Robert CoxAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They always look good
customer_reviews.text: Well made and good quality Great for every day use
customer_reviews.author: Terry Broad

customer_reviews.title: Confidence reduced in size advertised
customer_reviews.text: Reebok Men's Classic Leather Training Running Shoes - seventh or so pair of these that I have bought for my Father. Labelled up as a 9 and std size but far too narrow a fit.....strange.....
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great colour, love the sole, nice snug fit. No regrets buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mukuka Mwamba

customer_reviews.title: They’re classic for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: Love classics, tend to get a new pair every 9-12 months which is infrequent considering what I put them through! Most trainers last me maximum 6 months, but reeboks never lose their shape and are so comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Miners

customer_reviews.title: Good Trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for me. Good quality trainer and decently priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mick Easingwood

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Had these before so knew they would be good. Value for money
customer_reviews.author: cecilia stansfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, look stylish, comfortable, and great grip for my line of work.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are my 6th pair over the years. Always excellent quality and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: v.g.astley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bit old style (classic) I know but they are good
customer_reviews.author: b.c.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe just wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. The quality you’d expect from a Reebok classic. My only fault isn’t the shoe it’s self but the sizing. I ordered a UK11 but got send a UK10.5... rather frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Coomber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic trainers and so comfortable. Will definitely buy these again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: kev and jo porter

customer_reviews.title: Absolute classic
customer_reviews.text: It's a classic. Keeping them white is a pain. But well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. Prompt delivery. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: conski101

customer_reviews.title: spot on
customer_reviews.text: Gift for the husband he is happy he says they comfortable and fit him just right
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Solid product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly larger than most Trainers, but very comfy. A great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Clark

customer_reviews.title: trainers
customer_reviews.text: I brought reebok classics as I have for many years they always comfy
customer_reviews.author: Paul Duckett

customer_reviews.title: Returned by parcel post to bedford return centre 10th october ! Via royal mail
customer_reviews.text: Good style * & a nice fitting trainer for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken d.

customer_reviews.title: none
customer_reviews.text: The product was returned because I ordered the wrong size
customer_reviews.author: john walker

customer_reviews.title: Beauty in Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the finest trainer for casual or athletic use ever designed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best trainers I have ever bought, really comfortable and hard wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect fit. Very pleased with trainer. Delivery was even earlier than promised
customer_reviews.author: JAN

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE PLASTIC AND POOR QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: NOT LEATHER ! THEY ARE PLASTIC AND POOR QUALITY !
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Classic Leather Training Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Never go out of style. Soft garment leather upper gives you superior comfort. Die-cut eva midsole provides lightweight cushioning. Moulded pu sockliner adds comfort and durability.
feature_bullets: Der Classic Leather ist der absolute Kultschuh und Klassiker von Reebok für Herren.
Reebok Schriftzug an der Ferse und den Außenseiten
